body:
Many packages download via git, not via a URL. For these packages, running `spack versions` or `spack checksum` produces a useless error message.

### Expected Result

I would like to see something like this:
```console
$ spack versions stream
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  5.10
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  Found no versions for stream
```

### Actual Result

```console
$ spack versions stream
==> Error: <class 'spack.pkg.builtin.stream.Stream'>
```
title: spack versions/checksum crashes for packages without URL
